plot: In an enchanted land far away, a rebellious group of feral children fight for freedom against a malicious Queen, hell-bent on driving them from their village and inducting them into her evil empire.
title: In Darkness and in Light
plot_es: In an enchanted land far away, a rebellious group of feral children fight for freedom against a malicious Queen, hell-bent on driving them from their village and inducting them into her evil empire.
plot_en: In an enchanted land far away, a rebellious group of feral children fight for freedom against a malicious Queen, hell-bent on driving them from their village and inducting them into her evil empire.
